attributes.action: Muslims should be granted eid ul adha and Eid ul ftre holidays on request .
attributes.background: Both Eid hold values in Muslim religious.Eid ul ftre celebrated after holy month of Ramadan and Eid ul adha after the hajj (pilgrimage).Both eids are important for Muslims.

rejection.details:
It's up to employers to decide, within the law, which holidays their employees can take.

If you would like Eid to be a national holiday, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/150516
